website_summaries.verdict: Its reverse direction feature works to keep water on the umbrella, while keeping you dry.
pros: Pretty  array of 15 pattern and colors
cons: Some users report metal tips don't last

customer_reviews.title: Solid and pretty umbrella a good value
customer_reviews.text: In Tennessee we are having a good opportunity to use this umbrella it is sturdy and opens with ease and quickly. Closing it is not automatic but smooth. Just a little harder to make sure it locks closed; you have to pull firmly. The handle is convenient but takes some getting use to. Love the ability to contain and control the water dripping Over all I’d recommend this umbrella and buy it again
customer_reviews.author: DurangoMom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift so I just wrapped it and gave it to my friend Christmas eve. She opened it and the handle was broken. Aaarrgghh. She was gracious about it and took it home with her. Ordering another to replace it - going to make sure it's all in one piece BEFORE I give it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Janiss Daly

customer_reviews.title: Adorable umbrella 🌂
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these inverted umbrellas for years. This is a great deal and so far the umbrella seems to be great quality. Being a Floridian my umbrella gets a decent amped of use during hurricane season so I hope this holds up. I also like the design and was actually between a few choices 😊
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Good large umbrella One of the spokes had come undone, but that was easy to fix The image is nice, though it has drainage holes all around. Nothing too major My arm is unfortunately not all large, so I cannot hook it onto myself instead of holding it Takes a few seconds to retract and click in place when closing and putting it into the carrier bag takes time Still happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lovisa Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Very Unique Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I got this umbrella, not sure if it can do all the things I saw in their video. Well, it does! It rained the day after I got it and so I used it to test it. It opens and closes easily, it really does trap the water on the inside of the umbrella when you close it, and when you open it again, the water flies off of it! It also stands on its' own, as shown in their video. GREAT buy for the cost. You won't be sorry you ordered one...so many beautiful designs to pick from!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I was literally saving this umbrella for a rainy day. When I opened it up to use it, it snapped and completely broke. LOVE the design and concept, but for 20 something dollars it was a lost.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is beautiful, functional and well constructed. The seller assisted with great customer service when no fault of their own the product was damaged in shipping with a very quick response and replacement. It is rare and greatly appreciated when excellent customer service is provided and I am happy to say for a wonderful product. I have and will recommend this umbrella to others.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann Hohman

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my new umbrella. It is so nice to be able to open it with one hand due to the automatic open feature. The inside of my car now stays dry even in the worst rain. I get many compliments because it is also very pretty, the colors are bright and vibrant. The stand up feature is also a big plus. Can't say enough about this umbrella, just BUY it, you will not be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly tartaglia

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this! But ended up disappointed. It's a cute umbrella, but I ended up returning it because the handle broke when I pulled it out of the box. I thought about ordering a replacement, but I noticed the plastic felt cheap so I didn't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: When I received the original shipment, it looked like the box had traveled through a war zone! Amazon quickly replaced the umbrella, but a bit more shipping quality control would be helpful. I do like the umbrella though. If it can stand up to the rain and wind I commute in, it will be worth every penny. And so far it has!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Mavrogianis

customer_reviews.title: Inversion great
customer_reviews.text: someone so should of come up with this idea a long time ago. The inversion is fantastic in so many ways - drips opening when getting out of a car. The handle it great. Large to carry around but I like enough that I do not care about that
customer_reviews.author: Carol Brozek

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is perfect. I especially like the auto open button, the small holes in the inside lining for drainage and the handle which easily allows hanging in a closet or on a coat tree. It is also very attractive. I highly recommend this umbrella to others.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would return if I could but I threw away the packaging. When you open it it works great but to try and close it you have to do it manually which defeats the whole entire purpose of trying not to get wet getting into the car!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Codman

customer_reviews.title: beautiful umbrella which conveniently closes so the wet side doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful umbrella which conveniently closes so the wet side doesn't get all over the place. it is a bit bigger than I thought, but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: msnewbie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella. Makes one wonder why this innovation wasn't created sooner.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Very good umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I love how the umbrella stands upside down on it's own after use. I can't get the wrist hook to stay in place like in the video. Overall, it is a very good umbrella that does it's job, along with nice added features.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived deffective
customer_reviews.text: I have had an umbrella of this type and love it and have used mine for quite awhile but I don't know the vendor. Mine was wearing out and wanted one the same so I ordered one from here. It came defective and did not have the same quality as the previous one. I was disappointed and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor handle
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold onto your arm like I wanted, the loop is too big for that. Also very long to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love all the color choices
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new umbrella and it's gorgeous! I love all the color choices. It has not rained yet for me to be able to use it but I'm sure it will work great. It seems very well put together and sturdy! I will probably be ordering more as gifts for the upcoming holidays and a spare one for each car! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is AMAZING and with every penny to NOT drip everywhere! I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella!! Beautiful designs and so convenient in so many ways!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: sturdy functional sun umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I like that this umbrella has a long handle with a c shape. It makes it very comfortable to use on long walks. The inverted feature is great. Not sure why all umbrellas aren't made this way!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Naese

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best umbrella I’ve had so far I’m glad it turns inside out and that way you don’t get wet and love the styles of colors
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is very well constructed, pretty colorful, works easily. Haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: V R

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Best umbrella I ever had. I love that it auto-opens
customer_reviews.author: Julie Tran

customer_reviews.title: ... several more of these as gifts because they are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several more of these as gifts because they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cute umbrella love the style. Broke on first use! Returning
customer_reviews.author: ST3580

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product works well and a must have when you have to be out in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Janine Hare

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful umbrella! Have not had a chance to test drive in the rain as of yet, but did try it outside in blowing wind. The umbrella is easy to open and close as well as being sturdy in the wind!
customer_reviews.author: picky hair queen

customer_reviews.title: She loved it! Style and function
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my sister!! She loved it! Style and function!
customer_reviews.author: tricia sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I don’t get as wet with this umbrella as I did with a regular one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The item is a gift for my daughter-in-law. So I've yet to see how it works. It's pretty. I did order another one for myself it should arrive by the 7th I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney 2015

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stand up against wind well
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were a little more wind resistant. Other than that, they are great and I get a lot of comments about it!
customer_reviews.author: Neika

customer_reviews.title: umbrella heaven
customer_reviews.text: great invention , the umbrella, even better when you don't get soaked getting into your car, absolutely LOVE this umbrella! will never own a regular umbrella again.
customer_reviews.author: Geneandphil

product_meta.title: Reverse Inverted Inside Out Umbrella - Upside Down UV Sun Protection Windproof Brella That Open Better Than Most Umbrellas, Reversible Folding Double Layer, Suitable for Golf, Car, Women and Men
feature_bullets: AUTO-OPEN REVERSE OUTDOOR UMBRELLA: Our design is the unique Auto-Open frame, unlike many other Manual reverse umbrellas. Just press a button, and watch the umbrella spring open. No more manual handling and getting wet when entering or exiting your vehicle! Perfect as a gift!

WIND RESISTANT, DURABLE, UV AND RAIN PROTECTIVE CLOTH: Forget about cheaply made stroller and car umbrellas once and for all! This auto-open reverse umbrella is made of heavy duty, thick, windproof, rain and sun protective cloth, keeping you safe and comfortable at all times.

90 DAYS REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE: Dryzle stands by the high quality of our products, and buyers are automatically enrolled in our 90 days replacement program. If anything goes wrong with your product within 90 days of your purchase, let us know and we will send you a replacement - absolutely free!

ENJOY FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT AND EFFORTLESS HANDLING: Thanks to the special C shaped ribbed handle design that is larger than normal reverse umbrellas, this travel car umbrella allows you to keep your hands free and perform any task, without worrying about getting drenched in the rain. Hold your baby, carry your shopping bags, talk on the phone and do whatever you like effortlessly.

STAY DRY AND KEEP YOUR FLOORS AND CARS SAFE FROM WATER DRIPPING: No more wet clothes and floors for you! This must have wind resistant, folding reverse umbrella is exactly what you need to keep rain water from dripping in your car and all over your floors. What is more, the smooth opening and closing mechanism allows you to enter or exit your car without hassle.
